attributes.action: Restrict HGV on A34 between 07:00AM to 09:00AM and 16:00PM to 18:00PM
attributes.background: As most people using the A34 would know, HGVs on this busy route are often involved in the multitude of accidents which occur on this busy road. Statistically, most accidents on the A34 are due to or involve HGVs travelling during the rush hour, which can be reduced by restricting HGVs at rush hour.
